# mittwald_container_recreate (Action)

Recreates a container of a given stack.



<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `container_id` (String) ID of the container to recreate
- `stack_id` (String) ID of the stack in which to recreate a given container

### Optional

- `pull_image` (Boolean) Whether to pull the latest image before recreating the container
